text: Hello there, I just want to set the HS cookie when the visitor submits the HS form without accepting the cookie banner. Since we are notifying the visitor that the privacy policy will be accepting while submitting the form. For other's, the flow will be same as default. Could someone please help me?
you can do that with a form

Hi all. I'm attempting to set up a workflow to automate adding contacts to a Microsoft Teams Webinar after a HubSpot form submission. Upon enrolling a test contact, I keep bumping into the following error message where my contacts fail to enrol "because of an error in the connected app..", with a server response error - screenshot in thread.  Has anyone encountered this before or might now how to resolve? Thanks!
idk.. the video wants me to sign in and it's in spanish
This is HubSpot's own example on a new portal, so yes the second option

Hello All,
I’m facing an issue with workflows where I’m trying to copy a sensitive field (single-line text) to a public property, but it’s not working. The workflow runs, but the sensitive field doesn’t get copied to the public property. It works fine with a date type property.
Has anyone had this issue before or found a solution?
I’ve attached a screenshot of the workflow for reference.
